dashboard.label: Software
dashboard.description: Available ThreatER software versions and builds.

search.query: index=security_threater sourcetype=threater:software | spath | eval family=coalesce(family,"software"), build=tostring(buildNumber), release_time=coalesce(releaseDatetime,"") | table family version build status priority release_time hasReleaseNotes | sort - release_time

index=security_threater sourcetype=threater:software | spath | mvexpand architectures{} | eval architecture=architectures{}.architecture, md5sum=architectures{}.md5sum, supportsWifi=architectures{}.supportsWifi | table version architecture supportsWifi md5sum | sort version architecture
